actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide uniform periods for returns and payments of coal excise taxes.
short_title: Coal Excise Tax Payment Reform Act of 1981

summary.text: Coal Excise Tax Payment Reform Act of 1981 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require the collection of excise taxes on coal by means of a return filed according to a specified uniform schedule. Specifies that no deposit of tax shall be required before the last day for filing such a return.

titles.title: Coal Excise Tax Payment Reform Act of 1981
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide uniform periods for returns and payments of coal excise taxes.
